title: Moana 2 Limited Edition 4K Steelbook Preorders Are Steeply Discounted
description: Moana 2 Limited Edition Steelbook on 4K Blu-ray $45 (was $66) | Releases March 18 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Moana 2 on Blu-ray $28 (was $41) | Releases March 18 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Walmart Preorder DVD at Amazon Disney fans can now preorder Moana 2 on 4K or standard Blu-ray for significantly less than the original list prices. Moana 2's Limited Edition Steelbook was initially priced at $66, but as of March 3, Amazon and Walmart are selling preorders for $45. Meanwhile, the 1080p Blu-ray edition of the popular sequel is available to preorder for $28 at both retailers. Moana 2 releases on 4K UHD and 1080p Blu-ray on March 18. To pass the time while you wait for your preorder to arrive, check out the newly released Heihei Lego set.While there's no guarantee these discounts, or stock in general, will be available at launch--the Limited Edition already sold out multiple times at Walmart--both retailers offer preorder price guarantees. If you placed your order when prices were much higher, Amazon and Walmart automatically adjust your total to the lowest offered price when your preorder ships. Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Moana 2 releases on Blu-ray on March 18, and it includes every parent's favorite bonus feature: a full-length sing-along.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Disney fans can now preorder Moana 2 on 4K or standard Blu-ray for significantly less than the original list prices. Moana 2's Limited Edition Steelbook was initially priced at $66, but as of March 3, Amazon and Walmart are selling preorders for $45. Meanwhile, the 1080p Blu-ray edition of the popular sequel is available to preorder for $28 at both retailers. Moana 2 releases on 4K UHD and 1080p Blu-ray on March 18. To pass the time while you wait for your preorder to arrive, check out the newly released Heihei Lego set.

While there's no guarantee these discounts, or stock in general, will be available at launch--the Limited Edition already sold out multiple times at Walmart--both retailers offer preorder price guarantees. If you placed your order when prices were much higher, Amazon and Walmart automatically adjust your total to the lowest offered price when your preorder ships.

Moana 2 Limited Edition Steelbook on 4K Blu-ray

$45 (was $66) | Releases March 18

The Moana 2 Limited Edition Steelbook includes 4K UHD and 1080p Blu-ray discs alongside a voucher for the digital version of the hit Disney movie.

Just like Inside Out 2, the only way to get Moana 2 on 4K Blu-ray in the US is with the Limited Edition Steelbook.

The steelbook case features Moana, Maui, and Pua the Pig character art on the front. The back of the case shows the Adventure Canoe riding a big wave. The interior landscape art features Moana on the beach at sunset.

Along with the film itself, Disney is including a bunch of bonus features. If you loved the original movie's sing-along version, you'll be happy to learn Moana 2's physical release also includes a full-length sing-along edition. You'll also get to watch interviews with the crew, deleted scenes, and various featurettes.

Initial pricing for the Moana 2 4K Blu-ray Steelbook was quite steep compared to many other 4K steelbooks, but the $66 MSRP aligned with Disney hits like Inside Out 2 and Deadpool & Wolverine. And both of those movies sold out at $65-plus preorder prices. That said, it's nice to see Amazon and Walmart offer substantial discounts.

Moana 2 Bonus Features

  • Full-length sing-along: Sing along with your favorite songs with on-screen lyrics
  • Call of the Wayfinder: Meet real-life navigators from the Polynesian Voyaging Society
  • A New Voyage: A closer look at the development of the sequel featuring Auliʻi Cravalho and Dwayne Johnson
  • Songs of the Sea: A discussion with the songwriters about creating the film's soundtrack
  • Kakamora Chronicles: Hear from Moni about the real Solomon Island folklore surrounding the Kakamora
  • Fun in the Booth: Step inside the recording booth with the actors for a closer look at how they brought each character to life
  • Deleted scenes
  • Song selection

Moana Movie Deals

If you need to add the first Moana film to your collection, Amazon has Moana on 4K Blu-ray for $31 (was $39).

  • Moana 2 (Digital Copy) -- $20 ($30)
  • Moana (4K Blu-ray) -- $29.11 ($39)
  • Moana (Blu-ray) -- $18 ($27)

Moana Book Deals

For even more Moana, there’s an adorable Disney Moana 2 Little Golden Book for $5 (was $6) that’ll make a fun addition to any bookcase. Meanwhile, you can save big on official art books chronicling the production of both Moana movies.

  • The Art of Moana -- $23.49 ($42.50)
  • The Art of Moana 2 -- $35.39 ($45)
  • I Am Moana Little Sound Book -- $11 ($16)
  • Moana 2 Little Golden Book -- $5 ($6)

New Moana Lego Sets

Multiple Moana 2-themed Lego sets are available now, including the brand-new Heihei Figure that launched this month. This adorable 566-piece Lego set costs $40 and joins a pair of other Moana 2 Lego sets that released at the start of the year.

  • Lego Disney: Moana 2 - Heihei Figure (566 pieces) -- $40 | Released March 1
  • Lego Disney: Moana's Island Fun (175 pieces) -- $20
  • Lego Disney: Moana’s Adventure Canoe (529 pieces) -- $60
  • Lego Disney: Moana's Flowerpot (619 pieces) -- $40 | Exclusive to Target
